info.title: Unofficial Bungie.net API for Destiny 1
info.description: These are legacy endpoints for Destiny 1 that are no longer supported officially by Bungie.

servers.description: The final resting place for the first 3 years of Destiny.

/Destiny/TransferItem/.description: Moves items to and from a character and the vault.

post.description: Moves items to and from a character and the vault.

membershipType.description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

itemId.description: The instanceId of an equipable item. Should be "0" otherwise.

stackSize.description: How many items to transfer. Should be "1" for equipable items.

characterId.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.

transferToVault.description: Move the item to or from the vault; true or false

/Destiny/EquipItem/.description: Equips an item from a character's inventory. The endpoint will fail if the character is logged in and doing an activity.

post.description: Equips an item from a character's inventory. The endpoint will fail if the character is logged in and doing an activity.

membershipType.description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

itemId.description: The instanceId of an equipable item. Should be "0" otherwise.

characterId.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.

/Destiny/EquipItems/.description:
Equips multiple items from a character's inventory and returns the updated inventory and character information. The endpoint will fail if the character is logged in and doing an activity.

**Note:** This is an [experimental endpoint](https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Post/39966/187691777/1) that was accidentally left in. While it should work as intended, it may return [incorrect response data and has a higher bandwidth](https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Post/39966/196303703/0/0) than simply making multiple [[EquipItem]] requests.

post.description:
Equips multiple items from a character's inventory and returns the updated inventory and character information. The endpoint will fail if the character is logged in and doing an activity.

**Note:** This is an [experimental endpoint](https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Post/39966/187691777/1) that was accidentally left in. While it should work as intended, it may return [incorrect response data and has a higher bandwidth](https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Post/39966/196303703/0/0) than simply making multiple [[EquipItem]] requests.

membershipType.description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

items.description: The instanceId of an equipable item. Should be "0" otherwise.

itemIds.description: An array of item instanceIds to equip.

characterId.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.

/Destiny/SetLockState/.description: Changes the lock state on an equipable item.

post.description: Changes the lock state on an equipable item.

membershipType.description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

itemId.description: A valid instanceId of an item to lock/unlock.

characterId.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.

state.description: The item lock state, true to lock, false to unlock.

/Destiny/SetQuestTrackedState/.description: Set the track state of a given quest.

post.description: Set the track state of a given quest.

membershipType.description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

itemId.description: The unique item hash of the quest item.

characterId.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.

/Destiny/Stats/{membershipType}/{destiny.description: Returns historical stat information about a given Destiny character.

get.description: Returns historical stat information about a given Destiny character.

parameters.name: membershipType
parameters.description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

parameters.name: destinyMembershipId
parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.

parameters.name: periodType
parameters.description: Indicates a specific period type to return.

parameters.name: modes
parameters.description: Game modes to return. Comma separated.

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: Group of stats to include, otherwise only general stats are returned. Comma separated.

parameters.name: monthstart
parameters.description: First month to return when monthly stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM.

parameters.name: monthend
parameters.description: Last month to return when monthly stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM.

parameters.name: daystart
parameters.description: First day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: dayend
parameters.description: Last day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.

/Destiny/Stats/Account/{membershipType}/.description: Gets aggregate historical stats organized around each character for a given account.

get.description: Gets aggregate historical stats organized around each character for a given account.

parameters.name: membershipType
parameters.description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

parameters.name: destinyMembershipId
parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.

parameters.name: membershipType
parameters.description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

parameters.name: destinyMembershipId
parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Game mode to return. Required.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of results to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The current page to return. Starts at 1.

parameters.name: definitions
parameters.description: Include definitions in the response. Use while testing.

parameters.description: Game modes to return. Comma separated.

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response. Use while testing.

X-API-Key.description: When you have registered an Application at https://www.bungie.net/en/Application, you will receive an API key.  You should pass it in via this header with every request.

apiKey.description: Every request requires an API key.  To get an API key, register a new application at https://www.bungie.net/en/Application.
apiKey.name: X-API-Key

oauth2.description: For requests that require Authentication, you will need to have your users authenticate via our OAuth mechanisms.  See https://github.com/Bungie-net/api/wiki/OAuth-Documentation for more details.

scopes.ReadBasicUserProfile: Read basic user profile information such as the user's handle, avatar icon, etc.
scopes.ReadGroups:
Read Group/Clan Forums, Wall, and Members for groups and clans that the 
user has joined.
scopes.WriteGroups:
Write Group/Clan Forums, Wall, and Members for groups and clans that the 
user has joined.
scopes.AdminGroups:
Administer Group/Clan Forums, Wall, and Members for groups and clans that the 
user is a founder or an administrator.
scopes.BnetWrite: Create new groups, clans, and forum posts.
scopes.ReadDestinyInventoryAndVault:
Read Destiny 1 Inventory and Vault contents.
For Destiny 2, this scope is needed to read anything regarded as private. This is the only scope a
Destiny 2 app needs for read operations against Destiny 2 data such as inventory, vault, currency,
vendors, milestones, progression, etc.
scopes.ReadUserData:
Read user data such as who they are web notifications, 
clan/group memberships, recent activity, muted users.
scopes.EditUserData: Edit user data such as preferred language, status, motto, avatar selection and theme.
scopes.ReadDestinyVendorsAndAdvisors: Access vendor and advisor data specific to a user. OBSOLETE. This scope is only used on the Destiny 1 API.
scopes.ReadAndApplyTokens: Read offer history and claim and apply tokens for the user.
scopes.AdvancedWriteActions: Can perform actions that will result in a prompt to the user via the Destiny app.
